menuItem.name: Cheese_R_Us
menuItem.description: Famous Cheese_R_Us quarter pounder with cheese, pickle and Tomato Sauce, mustard in a sesame bun. Meal includes fries, salad and choice of drink.

menuItem.name: Cheese_and_bacon_R_Us
menuItem.description: Delicious Cheese_and_bacon_R_Us quarter pounder with cheese, bacon pickle and Tomato Sauce, mustard in a sesame bun. Meal includes fries, salad and choice of drink.

menuItem.name: Chicken_R_Us
menuItem.description: Famous Chicken_R_Us quarter pounder with cheese, salad and Mayo in a sesame bun. Meal includes fries, salad and choice of drink.
